tasks.label: Compile Scheduler
args: & { $sources = Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Filter *.java -Path 'src/main/java'; if($sources.Count -eq 0){ Write-Error 'No sources found'; exit 1 }; if(!(Test-Path 'out')){ New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'out' | Out-Null }; javac --release 21 -d out @($sources.FullName) }
